name: Project Xenomorph (BETA)
description:
Project Xenomorph is about a world in 3022 and we found out that aliens exist so  an AI made in a lab that was programmed to destroy all aliens so NASAS sent a space shuttle to go to outer space kill aliens and make the earth proud.

Will game get updated

Yes, this game will be updated the full version will come out I took a little pause to Square Knight to work on this game.

Where to contact if the game has bugs
